reviewtext: I got one for my wife and I am now thinking hard about one for me.  EXCELLENT choice for Mac users.  USB cradle recoginzed immediately.  Software (Palm Desktop) is not the most eye catching but it does the job.  Paid [amt] or about [amt] more than an Palm m100.  For that I got 8MB of RAM, USB Docking cradle and all the expansion of the springboard.  I have had no problem downloading lots of free software - even stuff that was supposed to be Win 9x only.  If you are a first time buyer/user of a PDA I recomend the Visor Deluxe.  Learn what you are really going to need without investing big $$'s.
